endpoint.name: infobox-tbl
endpoint.config: CREATE SCHEMA infotavl AUTHORIZATION SA CREATE TABLE infotavl.infotavl_beskeder ( message VARCHAR(255), id IDENTITY, expire_date date, link VARCHAR(255), title VARCHAR(255))

datasource.name: ds-infotavl
datasource.sql: select id, message, title, link, array_to_string(users_id, ',') as users_id from mtuserdata.infotavl_beskeder
select id, message, title, link, array_to_string(users_id, ',') as users_id from mtuserdata.infotavl_beskeder WHERE expire_date >= current_date AND [string: bruger] = ANY(users_id);

select id, message, title, link, array_to_string(users_id, ',') as users_id from mtuserdata.infotavl_beskeder WHERE expire_date >= current_date AND [string: bruger] != ALL(users_id) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM mtuserdata.infotavl_beskeder WHERE expire_date > current_date ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;

insert into mtuserdata.infotavl_beskeder(message,expire_date,link,title,users_id) values( [string: message],
to_date([string: expire_date],'DD.MM.YYYY'), [string: if IsDefined(link) then link else null endif], [string: title], '{}' );
UPDATE mtuserdata.infotavl_beskeder SET users_id = array_append(users_id, [string: bruger]) WHERE id = [id];
UPDATE mtuserdata.infotavl_beskeder SET users_id = array_append(users_id, [string: bruger]) WHERE id IN ([ids]);
